devdoc.details: Handles employee management, salary payments, and payment scheduling

returns._0: addresses Array of active employee addresses

devdoc.title: PayrollManager

calculatePaymentAmount(address).notice: Calculate payment amount based on frequency

getBalance().notice: Get USDC balance of this contract

getNextPaymentTime(uint256).notice: Calculate next payment time for an employee

isPaymentDue(address).notice: Check if payment is due for an employee

processEmployeePayment(address).notice: Process payment for a specific employee

processPayroll().notice: Process payroll for all eligible employees

totalPaymentsMade().notice: Get total payments made to all employees

userdoc.notice: Automated payroll management for treasury operations
